Package Game.GraphicObjects.Table

Class CheckersTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.GraphicObjects.GraphicWindow
      • Game.GraphicObjects.Table.WindowTable
        • Game.GraphicObjects.Table.CheckersTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphicComponents
    public class CheckersTable
extends WindowTable

    CheckersTable Class

    it is the class that has all the features and methods that concern the creation and management of the board.
    Since:
    31-08-2021
